label: Reset Knob... Knob... Reset... Knob.. Reset Knob
description: Resets the mod to default settings, only use this if you're having problems with the mod (such as dancers not responding etc). Once you've pressed this button, unpause the game then whack F5 (quick save) and restart the game.
